item.description: Experience May 2021/Present - Backend Software Enginner, Zup Innovation Maintainer of Horusec; open source security command line tool. Development of a semantic analysis engine that uses compiler techniques such as SSA and Data Flow Analysis to improve the accuracy of static code analysis. Jul 2020/May 2021 - Software Enginner, Konker Backend development of a SAST (Static Application Security Testing) tool using Go, PostgreSQL and RabbitMQ. Maintainer of Insider; SAST’s open source command line tool.
